protocol.text: The raw data refer to the linear data which has been summarized using a summarization algorithm (RMA16, PLIER 16 and Iterative PLIER 16). All summarization algorithms also do variance stabilization by adding 16.The normalized data are generated after the log transformation and baseline transformation step. ID_REF =  VALUE = normalized
10-day-old wild type (Col-0) and 35S:P53-transgenic plants. Replicates are derived from three independent biological experiments.
Arabidopsis seedlings were grown at 21-24 degreeC, 16-hour day length, 60% relative humidity
Total RNA was isolated from the frozen material using Invitrogen TRIzol.
RNA probes were labelled using the Ambion MessageAmp Premier.
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A).
GeneChips were scanned using the Axon Genepix Scanner (Genepix 4000B).
